src:
Gringo y un agasajo inolvidable

03 Nov 2019, 15:00



Foto: Carina Martínez.

Sampedrinos se unieron para homenajear a un personaje icono de la capital de la Araucaria, Rubén Zarsa, el popular Gringo, querido y admirado por todo el pueblo. El motivo del evento fue por su cumpleaños número 58. La fiesta fue emocionante, donde el agasajado no logró contener las lágrimas, en especial cuando le contaron el Feliz Cumpleaños. La fiesta se realizó a la canasta en el camping Farelluk, fueron muchas las personas que se sumaron para reconocer en vida a una de las figuras emblemáticas de la localidad, que con su carisma es capaz de sacar una sonrisa, aunque el día este siendo difícil,  a toda persona que se cruza con él por las calles de San Pedro, con total respeto, ganándose así, el cariño de todos. El grupo de vecinos que tuvo la maravillosa idea se mostró satisfecho y agradecidos con cada participante que hicieron posible, vivir una fiesta inolvidable y que sin duda quedará marcado en el corazón de todos, pero en especial de Gringo y la familia Ramírez que está a cargo de cuidarlo.“Fue un momento único, no hubo a quien no se cayera una lagrima, quisimos devolverle la felicidad que él nos da a cada uno en particular, él estuvo muy agradecido y nosotros orgullosos de haberle rendido un homenaje”, concordaron los vecinos organizadores.  Si querés sugerir o corregir algo sobre esta nota hace click acá  Si tenés un dato que puede ser noticia contáctanos acá
text:
Gringo and an unforgettable treat

03 Nov 2019, 15:00



Photo: Carina Martínez

Sampedrinos joined together to honor an iconic character from the capital of Araucaria, Rubén Zarsa, the popular Gringo, loved and admired by the entire town. The reason for the event was for his 58th birthday. The party was exciting, where the entertainer failed to hold back his tears, especially when he was told Happy Birthday. The party was held at the basket in the Farelluk campsite, there were many people who joined to recognize in life one of the emblematic figures of the town, who with his charisma is able to make a smile, although the day is being difficult , To every person who crosses with him through the streets of San Pedro, with total respect, thus earning everyone's love. The group of neighbors who had the wonderful idea was satisfied and grateful to each participant who made it possible to live an unforgettable party and that will undoubtedly be marked in the heart of everyone, but especially Gringo and the Ramírez family who is in charge to take care of it. "It was a unique moment, there was no one who did not fall a tear, we wanted to return the happiness he gives to each one in particular, he was very grateful and we are proud to have paid a tribute," agreed the neighbors organizers If you want to suggest or correct something about this note click here If you have a piece of information that can be news, contact us here
